113.heading: Bachelorhood.
113.title: "Shiva Parvati : a Story of Divine Love"/ retold by Kamala Chandrakant ; artwork: Ram Waeerkar. 32 p. in Amar Chitra Katha, no. 506
113.author: [No author]
notes: (Epics & Mythology)

Summary from back cover: "A powerful demon threatens the gods in their heavens. They need a saviour, who, Lord Brahma decrees, will be the son born to Shiva and Parvati. But Shiva, a badly-dressed, untidy, solitary ascetic, seems to enjoy bachelorhood. Even Parvati's unmatched beauty aided by Kama, the god of love, seems unequal to the task of enchanting the stern lord. This illustrated classic is based on Kumara Sambhava of Kalidasa."
Subtitle, series and summary from 2010 printing.

"Selected cartoons from You Give Great Meeting, Sid, volume 2."

116.heading: Bachelors.
116.title: A Diverted Christmas Gift
116.author: Leighton Budd.
notes: Summary: A fairy commissions a present for a lonely bachelor, but when she sees what the workmen have made, changes her own gender on the spot to romance the newly created girl.
Panel and caption story, detached from Puck (Dec. 1904).

notes: Story involves a magic lamp, and a law that bachelors may not raise children.

121.heading: Bachelors.

122.heading: Bachelors.
122.title: "Look at All the Dead Bugs in That Ceiling Lamp"
122.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Jon's response to the discovery of the bugs is to go watch TV, and Garfield thinks: "We're Bachelors, Baby."

123.heading: Bachelors.
123.title: "A Map of all the Fast Food Places"
123.author: by Johnny Hart.
notes: Summary: She's selling what she calls "The Bachelor's Cookbook."

124.heading: Bachelors.
124.title: Nothing But Loving You
124.author: by Erica Sakurazawa ; translator, Yuki Nakamura ; English adaptation, Lori Millican.
notes: "Parental advisory, explicit content."

"Nanako is a self-centered super model who's caught smack-dab in the middle of a love triangle. Bachelor #1 is a bisexual male model who has a steady boyfriend but totally turns her on, and Bachelor #2 is an up-and-coming actor who likes her more than she likes him. Nothing But Loving You follows Nanako as she navigates the rocky road of romance in search of her perfect soulmate."

125.heading: Bachelors.
125.title: "Try to Make Sure the Pizza Arrives During a Commercial!"
125.author: Thaves.
notes: Summary: Frank and Ernest are doing a cooking show for bachelors.

126.title: Bachelor's Diner
126.author: Cam
126.series: Sept. 1946) "Bring Us a Coupla Hamburgers and Then Go See Your Doctor!"*
notes: Art by Al Cammarata?
Summary: The waitress has stewed kidneys, boiled tongue, fried brains, pickled pig's feet, and boiled liver.

148.heading: Bachs, Eduardo Muñoz--Interviews.
148.title: "Casi Cinquenta Años con el Pincel en Mano : Charla con Eduardo Muñoz Bachs"
148.author: Darlo Mogno
148.appears_in: p. 193-200 in La Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 1, no. 3 (Sept. 2001).
notes: Resumen: "Para recordar al gran artista cubano Eduardo Muñoz Bachs, fallecido recientement, se publica una entrevista inédita de hace tres años, en que él recorre las etaps fundamentales de su carrera artistica y manifiesta sus preferencias en las áreas de la pintura, la literature y e cine."

Abstract: In memory of the great Cuban artist Eduardo Muñoz Bachs, who died recently, we present an unpublished interview from three years ago. Here he recounts the fundamental stages of his artistic career and indicates his preferences in the areas of painting, literature, and cinema.
Abstracts as printed with the article, with some editing of the English.
Includes illustrations.
